Hello World

About Daniel Zhang:

BIO

Hi there! I'm Daniel Zhang, a first-year student at the University of Toronto, currently studying Engineering Science. My interests include programming, reading, and playing or listening to music. I love attending hackathons and I spend my free time coding.

JOBS & EXPERIENCE

I've previously worked as a Summer Student Intern for Service Canada as part of the FSWEP program. I've also worked as a swim instructor for the City of Toronto and as a Assistant Math Teacher for Spirit of Math. I volunteered at Sunnybrook St.John's Rehab as a pianist and as a nutritional assistant.

EDUCATION

I graduated from Agincourt Collegiate Institute and I am currently attending the University of Toronto for Engineering Science. I have also participated in a variety of enriching programs and events, including SHAD at UBC and Hackathons such as Starterhacks and UofTHacks.

INTERESTS

I love music, and I've previously been a part of my high school choir, the Madrigal Singers, as well as the Wind Symphony, and am currently a part of the SKULE band. I also greatly enjoy reading. I spend much of my free time pursuing my interests such as programming and engineering.
